content: 8 stitches round 29 k1 m1r k1 m1l k1 pm - k to end of round round 30 knit round 31 k2 m1r k1 m1l k2 sm - k to end of round round 32 knit round 33 k3 m1r k1 m1l k3 sm - k to end of round round 34 knit round 35 k4 m1r k1 m1l k4 sm - k to end of round round 36 knit transfer 11 thumb stitches from needle one before the marker to holder i use a different color yarn as a holder round 37 knit increase 3 stitches on needle 1 - spread out the increases evenly across all the stitches on needle 1 rounds 38 & 39 knit rounds 40 - 64 k2p2 rib bind off loosely in pattern thumb transfer 11 stitches to your needles 5 on one needle and 6 on the other needle pick up 3 stitches from the body of the mitt so there are 6 stitches on one needle and 8 stitches on the other needle rounds 1 - 3 knit rounds 4 - 6 k1p1 rib bind off loosely in pattern weave in all ends - if there are any holes or loose stitches at the base of the thumb where you picked up the 3 stitches tighten the loose stitches and repair the holes with the loose end of the yarn that you attached to the thumb as you weave in the end
